# Sloth (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You are closest to your god while lazing and relaxing. You take no penalty to Armor Class against melee attacks while prone.

**Sloth Domain Spells**

**1 [[Touch of Fatigue (Spell)|Touch of Fatigue]]:** Touch attack fatigues subject.

**2 [[Unseen Servant (Spell)|Unseen Servant]]:** Invisible force obeys your commands.

**3 [[Deep Slumber (Spell)|Deep Slumber]]:** Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

**4 [[Slow (Spell)|Slow]]:** One subject/level takes only one action/round, –2 to AC, –2 on attack rolls.

**5 [[Symbol of Sleep (Spell)|Symbol of Sleep]] <sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

**6 [[Waves of Fatigue (Spell)|Waves of Fatigue]]:** Several subjects become [[Fatigued|fatigued]].

**7 [[Shadow Walk (Spell)|Shadow Walk]]:** Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

**8 [[Waves of Exhaustion (Spell)|Waves of Exhaustion]]:** Several subjects become [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**9 [[Astral Projection (Spell)|Astral Projection]] <sup>M</sup>:** Projects you and companions onto the [[Astral Plane]].
